title: Experience loft living at it's finest! 1185 Sq Ft!
posting_body: ['Residences at Stevens Pond', 'Visit Our Community Today!', '1 Founders Way', 'Saugus, MA 01906', '(781) 232-7097', 'YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'The Residences at Stevens Pond is conveniently located just minutes from US-1, I-95, and I-93 for a quick trip to Boston.', 'Our community is also surrounded by the beautiful Breakheart Reservation, making for a serene and quaint setting.', 'Plus, we are just walking distance away from elementary schools in the neighborhood.', 'Corner, two bedroom unit that offers wrap-around windows, a nice open living area and ample closet space.', 'Bedrooms: 2 |  Bathrooms:  2', 'Square Footage: 1185 sq ft', 'Rental Pricing: $2985 - $3844/Month', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '◾ 48-Hour Maintenance Commitment', '◾ Indoor Half-Basketball Court', '◾ Online Payments', '◾ Online Payments Available', '◾ Online Work Orders', '◾ Proud Affiliate of the NAA', '◾ Virtual Golf Simulator', '◾ Arcade Games and Billiards Table', '◾ Clubhouse (Newly Renovated!)', '◾ Fitness Center (State-of-the-Art with over $40k of New Equipment)', '◾ Outdoor Pavilion/Fireplace', '◾ Pool (Newly Upgraded)', '◾ Pool Deck (Brand New!)', '◾ Spa (Heated)', '◾ Tot Lot (Outdoor Little Tikes Play Area)', 'This Unit Comes With:', '◾ Cathedral or 9 ft.', 'Ceilings In Select Units', '◾ Central A/C', '◾ Full-size Washer and Dryer', '◾ Fully-Equipped Kitchen with Gas Range', '◾ Gas Burning Fireplaces', 'In Select Units', '◾ Generous Closet Space', '◾ Loft Style Apartments In Select Units', '◾ Pre-Wired for High-Speed Internet and Cable Access', '◾ Private Patios and Balconies', '◾ Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Phone-Number: (781) 232-7097', 'Pet-Policy: We charge monthly pet rent of $75, per pet per month.', 'Breed Restriction.', 'Lease-Length: 3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month, 17-Month, 18-Month', 'Call for Directions', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '1A2F89E73472479']
